procedure.title: BE2810C - Request for Tenders under Open (OJEU) Procedure for the Provision of Landscaping Services to Dublin City University (DCU)
procedure.description:
**Title: BE2810C - Request for Tenders under Open (OJEU) Procedure for the Provision of Landscaping Services to Dublin City University (DCU)**

**Description:**
Dublin City University (DCU) is seeking a suitable service provider to collaborate with the in-house Grounds Team for the provision of comprehensive Grounds Maintenance, Landscaping, and Winter Services across multiple campuses. The services required include:

1. **Grounds Maintenance:** Regular upkeep of the campuses to ensure they remain well-manicured and safe.
2. **Landscaping:** Design, installation, and maintenance of gardens, green spaces, and other outdoor areas.
3. **Winter Services:** Preparation and maintenance of the campuses during winter months to ensure they remain accessible and safe.

The tender is open to all qualified service providers who can demonstrate their ability to deliver high-quality landscaping services. The campuses involved are:
- **DCU Glasnevin Campus, Collins Avenue, Dublin 9**
- **DCU All Hallows Campus, Drumcondra, Dublin 9**
- **DCU St Patrick’s Campus, Drumcondra, Dublin 9**
- **Partial services at DCU Sports Campus, Ballymun Road, Dublin 9**
- **Morton Stadium, Swords Road, Santry**

The successful bidder will be expected to provide detailed proposals outlining their experience, methodology, and pricing for the services required. The Education Procurement Service (EPS) is managing this procurement on behalf of DCU and will evaluate bids based on criteria including technical competence, past performance, and value for money.

**Contact Information:**
For further information and to submit your proposal, please contact the Education Procurement Service (EPS) at:
- **Email:** info@educationprocurementservice.ie
- **Phone:** +353 61 233 715
- **Website:** https://www.educationprocurementservice.ie

**Submission Guidelines:**
Bidders must submit their proposals electronically through the EPS website. The deadline for submission will be clearly stated in the tender notice. Late submissions will not be accepted.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:
1. **Technical Competence:** The bidder's ability to deliver the required services.
2. **Past Performance:** The bidder's track record in similar projects.
3. **Value for Money:** The cost-effectiveness of the proposed services.

By submitting your proposal, you acknowledge that you have read and understood the terms and conditions of this tender notice. The Education Procurement Service (EPS) reserves the right to reject any proposal that does not meet the specified criteria or requirements.

lots.title: BE2810C - Request for Tenders under Open (OJEU) Procedure for the Provision of Landscaping Services to Dublin City University (DCU)
lots.description:
**Title: BE2810C - Request for Tenders under Open (OJEU) Procedure for the Provision of Landscaping Services to Dublin City University (DCU)**

**Description:**
Dublin City University (DCU) is seeking a suitable service provider to collaborate with the in-house Grounds Team for the provision of comprehensive Grounds Maintenance, Landscaping, and Winter Services across multiple campuses. The services required include:

1. **DCU Glasnevin Campus, Collins Avenue, Dublin 9:**
   - Grounds maintenance
   - Landscaping
   - Winter services

2. **DCU All Hallows Campus, Drumcondra, Dublin 9:**
   - Grounds maintenance
   - Landscaping
   - Winter services

3. **DCU St Patrick’s Campus, Drumcondra, Dublin 9:**
   - Grounds maintenance
   - Landscaping
   - Winter services

4. **DCU Sports Campus, Ballymun Road, Dublin 9:**
   - Partial grounds maintenance
   - Partial landscaping
   - Partial winter services

5. **Morton Stadium, Swords Road, Santry:**
   - Partial grounds maintenance
   - Partial landscaping
   - Partial winter services

The successful bidder will be expected to provide high-quality services that meet the specific needs of each campus, ensuring the upkeep and enhancement of the university's grounds. The Education Procurement Service (EPS) is responsible for managing this procurement process on behalf of DCU, ensuring compliance with the national procurement model and public service reform agenda. Interested bidders should have experience in providing similar services to educational institutions and demonstrate a strong track record in maintaining high standards of landscaping and grounds maintenance.

**Key Requirements:**
- Proven experience in providing comprehensive grounds maintenance, landscaping, and winter services to educational institutions.
- Ability to work collaboratively with in-house teams.
- Demonstrated expertise in managing multiple sites with diverse needs.
- Compliance with environmental and health and safety regulations.
- Ability to provide detailed service plans and schedules.
- Strong communication and project management skills.

**Submission Guidelines:**
Bidders should submit their proposals electronically through the EPS portal, ensuring all required documentation is included. The proposal should outline the bidder's experience, methodology, and approach to delivering the services, along with any supporting documentation such as references and case studies. The Education Procurement Service will evaluate proposals based on criteria including technical capability, past performance, and value for money.

**Contact Information:**
For any queries or further information, please contact the Education Procurement Service at info@educationprocurementservice.ie or +353 61 233 715.
